title: The ingagement and resolution of the principall gentlemen of the county of Salop for the raising and maintayning of forces at their own charge, for the defence of His Maiestie, their countrey, and more particularly the fortunes, persons, and estates of the subscribers under-named.
author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: Cf. Wing E734A which = Steele 2321 which has Steele notation: selves prevention very. Steele notation for this edition is: selves prevention Peace,.
Date of publication from Wing E734A.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
